import React from "react"; const Cart = ({ cart, changeQuantity }) => { return (

Cart

Book Quantity Price
{cart.map((book) => { return (
{book.title} ${(book.salePrice||book.originalPrice.toFixed(2))}
changeQuantity(book, event.target.value)} />
${}
); })}
Subtotal $9.00
Tax $1.00
Total $10.00
); }; export default Cart;
